entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries near midnight and ending before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
